PRD.name: RealTime-Tax-Compliance-Copilot
PRD.VISION: Build a real-time, intelligent tax & compliance copilot that removes fear, reduces dependency on intermediaries, and enables micro-businesses to become formally compliant with confidence.

PROBLEMS.PROBLEM: Fear of penalties and legal consequences
Complex and frequently changing tax laws
Poor awareness of timelines and obligations

SOLUTION.DESCRIPTION: A proactive, real-time compliance copilot that understands the user’s business context, tracks obligations automatically, explains actions in simple language, and prevents non-compliance before it occurs.

CORE_FEATURES.FEATURE: Business Profiling (nature, turnover, geography, tax regime)
Real-Time Compliance Calendar (GST, IT, TDS, local laws)

NON_GOALS.ITEM: Replacing professional accountants for complex litigation

THINKING_RULES.name: VibeCoding-Ruleset
THINKING_RULES.RULE: Always fix root causes, never apply surface-level patches
If a user is confused, the system failed—not the user
Prefer structural simplification over added instructions
Assume low financial literacy unless proven otherwise
Every rule must be explainable in one sentence
Prevent compliance failure before it happens
Design for fear reduction as a first-class objective
Optimise for trust, not just correctness
Systems should degrade gracefully under missing data
